item.title: About
item.description: Hey there, my name is Miguel Angel. I am a theoretical and computational scientist working in the Boston area. I got my bachelor degree from the University of Guadalajara, with a thesis work focused on protein kinetic stability. In my masters, I studied protein-membrane interactions using calorimetric techniques. Right now my primary interests are quantum mechanics, machine learning and promoting the STEM fields in Mexico. I am an active member of “Clubes de Ciencia,” working with the organizing team in the city of Guadalajara.
